    Dark Mode

    Caldigit Thunderbolt Dock - Awesome
    May 24, 2024
    • Review
    • Hardware

    One of the dreams of a modern geek is to be able to plug in a laptop computer with one cable and have everything connected on the desktop: monitors, keyboard, mouse, external hard drives, audio interfaces, midi devices, etc… I have had a variety of hubs and docks over the years. The closest have come to realizing this dream is having two cables, with a variety of adapters, until now. The Caldigit Thunderbolt Dock is a work of art. It is compact, rich with I/O ports, powerful, and elegant.

    Ports

    • 3 x Thunderbolt 4 (40Gb/s)
    • 3 x USB-C (10Gb/s)
    • 5 x USB-A (10Gb/s)
    • 1 x DisplayPort 1.4
    • 1 x SD 4.0 (UHS-II)
    • 1 x microSD 4.0 (UHS-II)
    • 1 x 2.5 Gigabit Ethernet
    • 1 x Front Combo Audio In/Out (3.5mm)
    • 1 x Rear Audio Out (3.5mm)
    • 1 x Rear Audio In (3.5mm)
    • 1 x DC In (19.5V 11.80A)

    Power

    Design

    Reliability
